option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
verbose. Log information to the console.
filename of the iqdat format file to read. If this is omitted, the file will be read from standard input

synopsis.p: Extracts timing and frequency information from a iqdat format file.

description.p: Extracts timing and frequency information from a iqdat format file.
The extracted section will be written to standard output

example.description: Extract timing and frequency information from the iqdat file "19990410.gbr.iqdat" to produce the plain-text file "1999041022.gbr.iqdat.txt".
